original_text: We destroyed them completely as a gift to the Lord. We had done the same thing to the cities of Sihon, king of Heshbon. We destroyed every city and we killed all the men, women and children.
korean_text: 우리가 헤스본 왕 시혼에게 행한 것과 같이 그 성읍들을 멸망시키되 각 성읍의 남녀와 유아를 멸망시켰으나

sentences.original_text: as a gift to the Lord
We had done the same thing
to the cities of Sihon, king of Heshbon
and we killed all the men, women and children
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 모든 남자, 여자와 아이들을 죽였습니다
